interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Luther 3
Review Date: 2013/09/30
Store: Various  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Award Winners in Movies & TV, Emmy Central, Emmy Nominees
Product Description: ['Luther 3', 'Idris Elba (The Wire) won a Golden Globe for his depiction of John Luther in this gripping, smart, and riveting psychological thriller from the BBC. In this new mini-series, a twisted fetishist is targeting young women in London. As Luther is called to another case, will the killer escape his grips? Luther faces an even bigger threat as members of his own team will stop at nothing to bring him down. And as a vigilante killer takes justice into his own hands, Luther questions his own sense of morality. Can he continue to walk the thin line between right and wrong, or has he finally met his match?', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Various', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '27576722', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '4 hours', 'Release date': 'September 10, 2013', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Studio': 'BBC Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: I loved seasons one and two and could not wait to watch season three. After having done so and recovered from the shock, I can honestly say I don't understand what the creators were thinking in having the characters make the choices they made. And the women, this season, were just two-dimensional victims for the most part. I'd probably re-watch seasons one and two but, sadly, not this one.
Review Title: i liked the previous two seasons better
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Luther 3
Various  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Award Winners in Movies & TV, Emmy Central, Emmy Nominees
['Luther 3', 'Idris Elba (The Wire) won a Golden Globe for his depiction of John Luther in this gripping, smart, and riveting psychological thriller from the BBC. In this new mini-series, a twisted fetishist is targeting young women in London. As Luther is called to another case, will the killer escape his grips? Luther faces an even bigger threat as members of his own team will stop at nothing to bring him down. And as a vigilante killer takes justice into his own hands, Luther questions his own sense of morality. Can he continue to walk the thin line between right and wrong, or has he finally met his match?', ']]>']
{'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Various', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '27576722', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '4 hours', 'Release date': 'September 10, 2013', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Studio': 'BBC Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'}
I loved seasons one and two and could not wait to watch season three. After having done so and recovered from the shock, I can honestly say I don't understand what the creators were thinking in having the characters make the choices they made. And the women, this season, were just two-dimensional victims for the most part. I'd probably re-watch seasons one and two but, sadly, not this one.
i liked the previous two seasons better
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** Strong interest in dramatic television series, particularly psychological thrillers.
- **Favorite Themes:** Enjoys complex characters and moral dilemmas, but may prefer well-developed female roles and narratives.
- **Previous Engagement:** Highly rated past seasons indicate a strong preference for continuity in storytelling and character development.
- **Critical Engagement:** Offers constructive criticism; values character choices and depth over mere plot twists.
- **Overall Sentiment:** Generally positive towards earlier work but skeptical of later installments when they do not meet prior quality standards.
- **Viewing Habits:** Likely to re-watch shows that maintain consistent quality, but may hesitate to revisit seasons that disappoint. 

This profile suggests a viewer who values character depth and strong narratives, while also showcasing a tendency to critique creative decisions that negatively impact the viewing experience.
